name: Auto Login using a secure tokenized url. Role wise login restriction.
author: Priyabrata Sarkar

sections.description:
Icon courtesy Recep Kütük https://www.iconfinder.com/recepkutuk.

Version 1.0.3: Fixed small text issues.

Version 1.0.2: Added E-mail templates. Added login redirect settings. Fixed settings save issues.

Version 1.0.1: Small redirect fix.

Version 1.0.0: Add more security options. Ip Check and reset token.

Version 0.0.4: Add Language Support. Alter Plugin name from token_login to token-login. Re activation required.

Version 0.0.3: Added role restriction. Option to add Token Url in New User Signup/Create.

Version 0.0.2: Added Re-Generate and E-mail option.

Version 0.0.1: Initial test and POC. More feature will be done in future including role restrict to login.

short_description: Icon courtesy Recep Kütük https://www.iconfinder.com/recepkutuk. Version 1.0.3: Fixed small text issues. Version 1.0.2: Added E-mail templates.
